context: The dashcam shows a nighttime urban street intersection with a crosswalk and parked vehicles along the right curb.
goal: Proceed straight through the intersection safely.
perception: The vehicle is stopped or moving slowly near a crosswalk at an intersection. There is a black SUV parked partially on the crosswalk and a red and white scooter parked on the sidewalk next to it. Pedestrians are crossing the street from left to right in front of the vehicle. Streetlights illuminate the scene, and a 'All Way' stop sign is visible on the right side, indicating a four-way stop intersection. The road is clear ahead beyond the crosswalk.
prediction: Pedestrians will continue crossing the street, and other vehicles at the intersection will likely proceed in turn following the four-way stop rules.
planning: Wait for all pedestrians to clear the crosswalk completely, then proceed straight through the intersection only when it is your turn according to the four-way stop traffic rules.
